result.eng: However bad things are today, they could be worse tomorrow.
result.ga: Dá dhonacht rudaí inniu d'fhéadfaidís bheith níos measa amárach

result.ponchtml: Dá ḋonaċt rudaí inniu d'ḟéadfaidís ḃeiṫ níos measa amáraċHowever bad things are today, they could be worse tomorrow.

result.html: Inniu Dé LuainToday is Monday.

result.eng: A large number of languages are being used in Ireland today.

result.eng: I am going over [literally, "eastwards"] to Galway today after work.

result.eng: Welcome back. On the programme today I am talking to Aoife Ní Loideáin.

result.eng: I did a great day's work today.

result.eng: If only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
result.ga: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith mé

result.ponchtml: Mo ċreaċ agus mo ċrá gan mé ċoṁ hóg leatsa inniu Ċaiṫfinn saol nár ċaiṫ méIf only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
